description: Cody Cummings is lounging in the California sun, living the lifestyle by the pool and inviting you to share an extended look into his life on set. Sharing the rays and soaking it up is Max Morgan, making his Next Door Studios debut and making an impression on Cody. Settle in for a steamy photo shoot in the jacuzzi, then stick around when it really heats up between the two of them, as Max goes all the way down on the Stallion, coming up for air only when Cody is ready to cum as well.  Enjoy!
title: Poolside Pics
